name: FIFAH: legends
description:
Play with bots or friends, select your favorite team, hit 116 goals and much more!

Become a true legend in FIFAH!

Instructions:

PLAYER 1

[W] Jump

[L] Left

[D] Right

PLAYER 2 (when multiplayer enabled)

[^] Jump

[<] Left

[>] Right

Support this game for updates!🙃
